title: Lone Brewer
summary: A lone brewer deep under the mountain.All these barrels and nowhere to run.
description: WhatLone Brewer is an Android Watch Face.It is also a tribute to a bewildering and awesome game "Dwarf Fortress"http://www.bay12games.com/dwarves/Strike the earth!Features12 or 24 hour watch displayday of the weektiny dwarven calendar linepaintable barrels, magma and cropseverything turns to rock salt in dimmed mode, for reasonsAcknowledgementsLord Nightmare/IBM 8x8 tileset from Dwarf Fortress tileset repositoryhttp://dwarffortresswiki.org/Tileset_repositoryIt would have taken forever without REXPainthttp://rexpaint.blogspot.jp/It would have been less weeeeee without Android Wear Color Pickerhttps://github.com/BoD/android-wear-color-pickerAnd Color Picker for Androidhttps://github.com/chiralcode/Android-Color-PickerBackstoryLong time ago, a fortress has been abandoned by its omnipotent ruler.Content rating "Everyone" prevents this description from mentioning the gruesome details.One of the brewers, however, refusing to succumb to the ultra-violence, continued once assigned task of making dwarven wine. Unfortunately, helmet and helmet byproducts diet made him go bananas.When not re-arranging barrels and crops, he walks in lines and circles.Sometimes he sleeps.He never dreams, though.Lone Brewer is open source and free software. The source code is available at GitHub: https://github.com/nemui/lonebrewerwatchface
descriptionHTML:
What
Lone Brewer is an Android Watch Face.
It is also a tribute to a bewildering and awesome game "Dwarf Fortress"
http://www.bay12games.com/dwarves/
Strike the earth!


Features
12 or 24 hour watch display
day of the week
tiny dwarven calendar line
paintable barrels, magma and crops
everything turns to rock salt in dimmed mode, for reasons


Acknowledgements
Lord Nightmare/IBM 8x8 tileset from Dwarf Fortress tileset repository
http://dwarffortresswiki.org/Tileset_repository

It would have taken forever without REXPaint
http://rexpaint.blogspot.jp/

It would have been less weeeeee without Android Wear Color Picker
https://github.com/BoD/android-wear-color-picker

And Color Picker for Android
https://github.com/chiralcode/Android-Color-Picker


Backstory
Long time ago, a fortress has been abandoned by its omnipotent ruler.
Content rating "Everyone" prevents this description from mentioning the gruesome details.
One of the brewers, however, refusing to succumb to the ultra-violence, continued once assigned task of making dwarven wine. Unfortunately, helmet and helmet byproducts diet made him go bananas.
When not re-arranging barrels and crops, he walks in lines and circles.
Sometimes he sleeps.
He never dreams, though.


Lone Brewer is open source and free software. The source code is available at GitHub:
https://github.com/nemui/lonebrewerwatchface
comments: I really wish it worked on my phone, Im a big fan of Dwarf Fortress and would love this, but it doesnt work as a background, sadly.
Doesn't work on my phone Can't set it as a wallpaper.
It's a fun little watch face.
Needs alcohol to get through the working day... Innovation and Dedication all the way! Hopefully those light-loving elves don't show up trying to trade! 10/10 would brew again!
recentChanges: - chin problem rectified - observe the brewer and his still at all times
- hemisphere setting. affects dwarven calendar and not your actual physical location
